welcome_message_body: Welcome to the beautiful Gold Coast, known for its stunning beaches, vibrant nightlife, and lush hinterland. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the wonders this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Caffe Republic
restaurants.description: Caffe Republic is a café located in Bundall.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southport Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Southport Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
